amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? TITLE X--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS ? SEC. 10001. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used for the Institute for Exploration at Mystic Aquarium in New London, Connecticut.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any of the funds in the bill from being used for the Institute for Exploration at Mystic Aquarium in New London, Connecticut.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 77 - 347, 1 Present (Roll no. 298).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
